statements: UPDATE multimedia_content SET media_url='https://example.com/image.jpg', media_type='image' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE multimedia_content SET user_id='987e6543-21b8-34d1-b456-546433142760' WHERE id='223e3377-c34a-12d3-d456-426134134000';
UPDATE multimedia_content SET media_type = 'video', media_url = 'https://example.com/video.mp4' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE multimedia_content SET media_url = 'https://example.com/image.jpg', user_id = '98765432-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-098765432100' WHERE id = '9abcdef0-1234-5678-4321-abcdef098765';
UPDATE multimedia_content SET content_type='image' WHERE content_id=1
UPDATE user_profile SET email='new_email@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=5
UPDATE multimedia_content SET content_url = 'new_url_1' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE Images SET image_url='new_image_url', user_id=123 WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE Videos SET upload_date='2022-12-22 10:30:00', video_url='new_video_url' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE Images SET image_url = 'new_image_url_1' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE GIFs SET user_id = 5, gif_url = 'new_gif_url_2' WHERE gif_id = 3;
UPDATE images SET image_data = <new_image_data>, upload_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = <specific_user_id>;
UPDATE videos SET upload_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE video_id = <specific_video_id>;
UPDATE images SET image_data = 'updated image data', upload_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE images SET image_url='https://example.com/new_image.jpg', upload_timestamp='2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE videos SET user_id=5, video_url='https://example.com/new_video.mp4' WHERE video_id=3;
UPDATE images SET image_url='updated_url_1', upload_timestamp='2022-10-25 10:30:00' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE videos SET user_id=3, video_url='updated_video_url', upload_timestamp='2022-11-15 15:45:00' WHERE video_id=2;
